job_tasks.justification: CI/CD deployment modeling falls under the broader scope of software development practices, specifically related to the automation and orchestration of software delivery.

job_tasks.phrase: Het schrijven en beheren van Puppet rollen en Ansible playbooks
job_tasks.justification: Puppet and Ansible are configuration management tools used for automating infrastructure and deployments, which is a core aspect of operations engineering/DevOps.

job_tasks.phrase: Acteert in een DevOps team (samen met andere developers, een product owner, scrummaster en QA Engineer)
job_tasks.justification: Being part of a DevOps team implies collaboration on software development and delivery processes.

job_tasks.phrase: Het maken van designs en models
job_tasks.justification: Creating designs and models for systems is a fundamental software development activity.
Gathering user needs and problem statements is a crucial step in understanding business requirements and translating them into technical solutions.

job_tasks.phrase: Het in detail uitwerken van de functionele requirements en user stories tot verschillende deliverables.
job_tasks.justification: Elaborating functional requirements and user stories into deliverables is a direct translation of business needs into actionable technical tasks.

job_tasks.phrase: Het meenemen en inwerken van meer junior Linux engineers.
job_tasks.justification: Mentoring junior engineers is a part of team development and knowledge sharing within a software development context.

job_tasks.phrase: Het bijdragen aan de functionele test van opgeleverde software.
job_tasks.justification: Contributing to functional testing of delivered software is a software development lifecycle activity.

job_tasks.phrase: Het evalueren van designs met de key users, stakeholders en eindgebruikers.
job_tasks.justification: Evaluating designs with users and stakeholders is essential for aligning technical solutions with business needs and gathering feedback.

job_tasks.phrase: Automatisering en implementatie van RHEL, RedHat, IPA, Ansible, Puppet, VMWare, NSX-T LVM, PKI, NFS
job_tasks.justification: The automation and implementation of infrastructure components like RHEL, RedHat, Ansible, Puppet, VMWare, etc., are core responsibilities of operations engineering and system administration.

soft_skills.phrase: communiceer je vaak en veelvuldig met: Met de PO'er, key users, stakeholders en eindgebruikers
Met de Teamlead over de functionele inhoud, gebruiksvriendelijkheid en voortgang van het werkpakket en over de testresultaten.
Het meenemen en inwerken van meer junior Linux engineers.

classification.rationale: This job description focuses heavily on Linux system administration, configuration management (Ansible, Puppet), and DevOps practices. It does not mention any generative AI technologies, LLMs, or related specialized tasks, making it irrelevant to the GenAI Engineer profile.
